item.title: Menu
item.description: fresh pastries made daily $(various prices) ask your barista about today’s selection (mostly :v:) (:gf: options) house made granola with local honey $$ milk — 5.25 $$ yogurt — 6.5 $$ hello — 2.3 $$ yogurt and fresh seasonal fruit — 8.5 $$ milk and yogurt options are :d: or :v: aardvark toasts all of our toasts are served on our house made aardvark bread, a seedy rustic loaf of legend.

item.title: Location & Hours
item.description: Copeka Coffee Open Daily: 6:30am - 8pm Open Late: For Events Closed: Thanksgiving & Christmas Day 1012 N. 5th St Grand Junction, CO 81501 970.628.0878 Copeka Big Cheese Truck Open Monday - Friday: 10:30am - 2pm Other Hours for Events Located next to Copeka Coffee along 5th Street

item.title: Friday, March 23, 2018
item.description: To-Do Follow up on floor plan migration with Cece and Larrry. See Larry’s emails create migration list of forms and content from SharePoint Test Staff Absence Report with other Managers and Wendy Tech Mart tests SQL Javascript

item.title: Friday, March 23, 2018
item.description: To-Do Follow up on floor plan migration with Cece and Larrry. See Larry’s emails create migration list of forms and content from SharePoint Test Staff Absence Report with other Managers and Wendy Tech Mart tests SQL Javascript

item.title: Thursday, March 22, 2018
item.description: Evaluate webform options Layout is the big issue with web form editoring software. I have already evaluated Google Forms and Web Presence. Today I evaluated a long list of Web Presence Calendar iCal subscriptions. Checked into the issue of why the Staff intranet is not allowing iCal subscriptions Rob Snodgrass+− Hello, how may I help?10:53 AM A couple of weeks ago, I chatted about iCal feeds on appearing on the calendars of our Staff website.

item.title: Wednesday, March 21, 2018
item.description: Worked with Toby on SSIS Finished Work on Tech Mark migration tests

item.title: Monday, March 19, 2018
item.description: T-SQL Fundamentals Read Chapter 5 “Table Expressions” and worked through first 4 questions Reviewed content on SharePoint Created migration notes document TechMart started to create Computer order form on Google Forms

item.title: Thursday, March 15, 2018
item.description: Web Presence webcast Notes Messenger App - collects current parent contact info new calendar coming 301 redirects maintian old links works in WP with moved content automatically can be used for clean short links custom apps includes calendars & news for specific school great control of what is in news feeds more and more statistics stats for channel subscriptions Safe Arrival parents can report in advance communcations through the app Communicate module quicktip safety related anonymous reporting tool free Followed up with Mary and BJ about which parts of Web Presence and Communicate we use and how it interfaces with Synergy.

item.title: Wednesday, March 14, 2018
item.description: Staff meeting Review Google Drive transition with Larry, Jenann Review Tech Mart Options Larry and I looked at the options for the Tech Mart ordering system using either Web Presence or Google Forms: Web Presence While Presence has a web based GUI to build web forms, it is rather difficult to use for anything beyond very simple forms. It is possible to build very complex Google Easy to create forms, with minimal workflow

item.title: Tuesday, March 13, 2018
item.description: Migrated Share Point Files to Google Migrated the following folders from Share Point to the Google Team Drive: Technology Operations Support Processes Operating Stats This should complete the file move. We still need to disable/restrict/delete the file access on Sharepoint. Created How-To Section for Tech Staff on Web Presence. https://staff.d51schools.org/my_teams/tech_team/how-to/ Screen cast for Incident Management I created a short screencast to show how to create Incident Management Alerts on Web Presence.

item.title: Markdown Block Formats
item.description: Layout & typography ::: margin left book ::: Grand Junction – Text set in all caps gets converted to small-caps by default. This means that acronyms like BBC don’t stand out relative to the rest of the text. Acronyms even $ x^2 $ work with $ x f(x) = 2x^2 + 2/3 $ accents like ÀÊØ. A possessive acronym like CNN’s opinion works as well. What about the FCC!
